result.eng: Do you have a special price for a family?
result.ga: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.orig: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlann
result.html: An bhfuil praghas speisialta agaibh do chlannDo you have a special price for a family?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil praġas speisialta agaiḃ do ċlannDo you have a special price for a family?

result.eng: There will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ga: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.orig: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúir
result.html: Eagrán ar leith a bheas ann seó deireanach an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.
result.ponchtml: Eagrán ar leiṫ a ḃeas ann seó deireanaċ an tséasúirThere will be a special edition, the last show of the season.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
